location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from John MacLeod, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Captain Hardy, Senior Officer of Marine in the Gulf of Persia

mods.abstract: MacLeod encloses a bill of landing for treasure shipped on board the Volunteer, Captain Waterman (not included, but copied in the text of the letter). He writes that Hardy has already passed a receipt for four thousand rupees and requests that he take a duplicate receipt from the commander of the cruizer.
